DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : To describe compare safety efficacy treatment AAT chronic pancreatitis patient undergo total pancreatectomy islet autotransplantation ( TP-IAT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Alpha-1 Antitrypsin ( AAT ) Enhances Islet Autograft Survival Patients With Chronic Pancreatitis
DOC.detailed_description: The goal study ass whether infusion Prolastin-C peri-transplant period enhance islet autograft survival function chronic pancreatitis patient total pancreatectomy islet autotransplantation . This prospective , control , double-blind study . The primary endpoint area curve serum C-peptide level first 4 hour mixed meal tolerance test ( MMTT ) , normalized number islet equivalent ( IEQ ) /kg day 365Â±14 transplant .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule total pancreactectomy islet autotransplantation Age > 18 year Diabetes free surgery Patients immunosuppression Patients puestow frey pancreatic surgery Patients Immunoglobulin A ( IgA ) deficiency , know antibody IgA , individual history severe immediate hypersensitivity reaction , include anaphylaxis Alpha1proteinase inhibitor product ( allergic AAT )
